newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Steady to off 0.150 cent. Both fed cattle and boxed beef markets look weak.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to off 0.150 cent. Higher trending corn futures should keep market pressured.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to up 0.150 cent. Steady to higher live indications should offset weakness in cutout values.
PORK BELLIES - Steady to up 0.250 cent. Carryover demand seen on expected out-movement from storage.
